preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from challenge where title = 'first challenge' and description = 'description for first challenge'

changeSet.sql: insert into challenge values (default, 3, 'first challenge', '2021-03-02 20:28:51.357453 +03:00', '2021-03-02 22:00:00.000000 +03:00', 'description for first challenge');
